title: Eastern China Retreat near Wuhan with Three Restaurants & Pool
description:
Nestled in mystical Zhangjiajie, this hotel offers an exciting stay amid breathtaking natural wonders. Indulge in Western and traditional Cantonese cuisine at one of three onsite eateries. Refresh in the sparkling outdoor pool or state-of-the-art fitness centre, all in an atmosphere of refined elegance.

Adventure awaits beyond your doorstep in this UNESCO World Heritage wonderland. Explore the sandstone pillars of Zhangjiajie National Forest Park, soar above clouds on the famous glass bridge, or discover the ancient Tianmen Fairy Mountain. From Avatar-inspiring landscapes to cable car rides, Pullman Zhangjiajie is your gateway to nature's most spectacular playground.
offer_address: No. 188 Gaoyun Road Wulingyuan, Zhangjiajie, Hunan 427400, China
